data.name: Bounters
data.detailed_description:
About This Game

Fight, Loot, Bounty, Leave, Repeat.
Bounters is a multiplayer looter shooter game.
Purchase weapons, armors, grenades, healing, and ammo to fight and survive.
Players can earn money by looting the lootboxes in a game field, or fight against opponent players and claim their bounties.
Be sure to survive and exit from the field to make your loots and claimed bounties to your money. Otherwise, you will lose them!

Host the server and play with other players in worldwide or friends!

Key Gameplay:

  • Gear up with desired loadout
  • Look around for lootboxes to loot
  • Fight with opponent players for their bounty
  • Finish tasks for bonus reward
  • Survive and exit from the field

Planned Features:

  • More gamemodes
  • More fields
  • More weapons and attachments
  • Steam Workshop supports for custom field, player skins, and helmet/armor
  • Day/Night Cycle, and random events during ingame

data.short_description: Bounters is a multiplayer looter shooter game. Setup your loadout, fight, loot, take bounties, and exit the field to claim all loots and bounties you got!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4710MQ 2.5GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD8970M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet Connection required for multiplayer gameplay.
